Title: Gusta Eidum to Alma C. Wilson 1947.4
Description: LETTER FROM GUSTA EIDUM, BOX 68, NARVIK, UNDATED.  POSTSTAMPED APRIL 5TH(? UNCLEAR) – 1947.  TO FRU (MRS.) ALMA WILSON, 102 WEST 5 STREET, DELL RAPIDS, SYD DAKOTA, U.S.A.  AN 80 ØRE, RUST COLORED STAMP WITH LION.
Creator: Gusta Eidum
Siri Lawson, trans.
Text:
your cousin Gusta

We have never paid duty on the packages.
